trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to a communication object that has faulted.
trans-unit.target: 對發生錯誤的通訊物件進行呼叫時，所擲回的例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> is thrown when a call is made to a faulted communication object.
trans-unit.target: 對發生錯誤的通訊物件進行呼叫時，會擲回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> is a derived class of <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> and can occur in correct applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> 是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的衍生類別，且會發生在正確的應用程式之中。

trans-unit.source: Because typically the code that calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method reports the error condition that caused the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this exception indicates that the call failed but the most useful error information is elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 因為呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法的程式碼通常會回報導致呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的錯誤狀況，所以此例外狀況指出呼叫失敗，但大部分有用的錯誤資訊會存放在其他地方。

trans-unit.source: If an object is faulted with several pending calls, only one call throws a specific exception; the others throw <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件因有數個暫止呼叫而發生錯誤，只有一個呼叫會擲回特定的例外狀況，其他呼叫則擲回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> using the specified `message`.
The serialization information used to create the exception object.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立例外狀況物件的序列化 (Serialization) 資訊。

trans-unit.source: The context within which the exception object is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立例外狀況物件所在的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> class when deserializing a stream using the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化資料流時，使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called when deserializing a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> object from a stream.
trans-unit.target: 從資料流還原序列化 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> 物件時，會呼叫這個建構函式 (Constructor)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> class using the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息和內部例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> using the specified `message` and `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> 與 `message` 來建立新的 `innerException`。
